entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as sounding exhausted when Harry knocks on the door.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He has a memory from Slughorn that he wants to share with Dumbledore.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry has obtained a memory from him that he wants to share with Dumbledore.

entities.name: gargoyle
entities.description: A gargoyle that guards the entrance to Dumbledore's office. It leaps aside when Harry enters.

relationships.description: Harry visits Dumbledore in his office, as evidenced by the fact that he knocks on the door and is let in by the gargoyle.
Harry has obtained a memory from Slughorn, which he wants to share with Dumbledore.
The gargoyle guards the entrance to Dumbledore's office.
